## Checklist

- [ ] Tests written and passing (`npm test`)
- [ ] Tool names follow conventions (lowercase, underscores, max 64 chars)
- [ ] Zod schema covers all parameters
- [ ] No credentials or secrets in code
- [ ] README or inline docs updated if needed
